objects.text:
• Space-Saving Stackable Design
• Digital LED Display & Controls
• Multiple Wash & Dry Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Performance

product_details.name: Insignia™ High-Efficiency Washer & Dryer Set - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Space-saving stackable design perfect for apartments and compact spaces
• Digital LED display with intuitive controls for easy operation
• Multiple wash and dry cycles to handle all fabric types
• Energy-efficient performance to reduce utility costs
• Sleek white finish with modern black accents
• Large capacity drum accommodates family-sized loads
• Advanced temperature control settings for optimal care
• User-friendly interface with clear cycle indicators
• Durable construction with premium components
• Convenient front-loading design for easy access
• Built-in ventilation system for efficient drying
• Time-saving quick wash and dry options available

banner_details:
This banner promotes a compact laundry appliance with a clean and modern design. The layout is divided into quadrants with a subtle grid and circular background accents, giving it a structured yet contemporary feel. The top-left features a bold brand name (`brand`) and stacked heading (`heading`), while a sleek blue subheading (`subheading`) and tagline (`tagline`) follow directly below. The product image (`product_image`) occupies the right half, vertically stacked in a realistic perspective. The feature list (`description`) is highlighted on the lower left in white text on a blue background. Pricing (`price`) and a call-to-action button (`cta` & `cta_background`) complete the composition, encouraging purchase intent.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Gray: `#F5F5F5`, `#E8E8E8`, `#D6D6D6`
- Blue: `#4B8BCC`, `#3A78B6`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Dark Gray: `#333333`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern washer-dryer set with a predominantly minimalist color palette. The primary color is a clean, crisp white (#FFFFFF), which dominates the frame and emphasizes the appliance's hygiene and efficiency appeal. The central circular doors are framed in a glossy black (#1A1A1A), providing a strong contrast that draws attention to the user interface areas and adds a high-tech flair. Control panels incorporate subtle uses of medium gray (#A9A9A9) and electric blue (#1E90FF) for function labels and digital displays, enhancing readability and sophistication. These colors are smoothly blended, giving a cohesive, premium look while ensuring critical elements stand out.
